rules_text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent draws a card, create two Junk tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“The future is now, old man. Wanna see it for yourself? Hop on.”[/i]
